attributes.action: Ban the use of Captive bolt guns as a method for killing domestic pets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call for the imediate ban on the callous use of captive bolt guns followed by pithing as a method to euthanase domestic pets such as dogs. There is no need for this method to be used on pets yet horrifically this cruel action is being used by a major animal welfare charity.
